rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody:
Vidisti domine et exspectasti agonem meum quomodo pugnavi in stadio
sed quia et quia
nolui obedire volui obedire voluit obedire mandatis principum iussa sum
in mamilla torqueri in mamillas torqueri in mamillam torqueri

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

verses.vBody: Propter veritatem et mansuetudinem et iustitiam

rep.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
